languages.text: {n}Друкари окидывает вас внимательным взглядом.{/n} "Эта возня вокруг меня порядком утомила. Почему ты еще не прояснил{mf||а} положение вещей для своих слуг? Поставь их на место, или же я поберегу свое время и силы для кого-то, кто их ценит".

{n}Marazhai examines you intently.{/n} "I have had enough of all this fussing. Why have you still not made it clear to your servants? Put them in their place, or I will save my time and energy for someone who appreciates them."
languages.original_text: {n}Друкари окидывает вас внимательным взглядом.{/n} "Эта возня вокруг меня порядком утомила. Почему ты еще не прояснил{mf||а} положение вещей для своих слуг? Поставь их на место, или же я поберегу свое время и силы для кого-то, кто их ценит".

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai examines you intently.{/n} "I am done with all this tiresome noise around me. Why have you still not made it clear to your servants? Put them in their place, or I will save my time and energy for someone who appreciates them."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}マラズハイは熱心にあなたを調べた。{/n}「この騒ぎはもうたくさんだぜ。なんでお前の召使どもにはっきり言ってやらねえんだ？奴らを元の立場に戻せ。さもなきゃ俺の時間と労力はその価値が分かる他の誰かにとっておくぜ」
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai examines you intently.{/n} "I have had enough of all this fussing. Why have you still not made it clear to your servants? Put them in their place, or I will save my time and energy for someone who appreciates them."

traits.locale_text: {n}マラズハイは熱心にあなたを調べた。{/n}「この騒ぎはもうたくさんだぜ。なんでお前の召使どもにはっきり言ってやらねえんだ？奴らを元の立場に戻せ。さもなきゃ俺の時間と労力はその価値が分かる他の誰かにとっておくぜ」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋仔细地看着你。{/n}“我已经受够了这些大惊小怪，不如你和你的下仆把话说清楚吧？摆正他们的位置，让他们老实点，否则，如果你更欣赏你那些下仆的话，我就不打算再把时间和精力留给你了。”
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai examines you intently.{/n} "I have had enough of all this fussing. Why have you still not made it clear to your servants? Put them in their place, or I will save my time and energy for someone who appreciates them."

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋仔细地看着你。{/n}“我已经受够了这些大惊小怪，不如你和你的下仆把话说清楚吧？摆正他们的位置，让他们老实点，否则，如果你更欣赏你那些下仆的话，我就不打算再把时间和精力留给你了。”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai vous observe d'un regard intense.{/n} « J'en ai plus qu'assez de ces enfantillages. Qu'attendez-vous pour tirer les choses au clair avec vos domestiques ? Remettez-les à leur place, ou je réserverai mon temps et mon énergie à quelqu'un qui saura les apprécier à leur juste valeur. »
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai examines you intently.{/n} "I have had enough of all this fussing. Why have you still not made it clear to your servants? Put them in their place, or I will save my time and energy for someone who appreciates them."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai vous observe d'un regard intense.{/n} « J'en ai plus qu'assez de ces enfantillages. Qu'attendez-vous pour tirer les choses au clair avec vos domestiques ? Remettez-les à leur place, ou je réserverai mon temps et mon énergie à quelqu'un qui saura les apprécier à leur juste valeur. »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai te examina atentamente.{/n} «Estoy harto de todos estos remilgos. ¿Por qué no les explicas la situación a tus sirvientes? O les dejas claro cuál es su lugar, o me guardaré mi tiempo y energía para alguien que sepa apreciarlos».
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai examines you intently.{/n} "I have had enough of all this fussing. Why have you still not made it clear to your servants? Put them in their place, or I will save my time and energy for someone who appreciates them."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai te examina atentamente.{/n} «Estoy harto de todos estos remilgos. ¿Por qué no les explicas la situación a tus sirvientes? O les dejas claro cuál es su lugar, o me guardaré mi tiempo y energía para alguien que sepa apreciarlos».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai mustert dich gründlich.{/n} "Ich habe genug von diesem Wirbel. Warum habt Ihr es Euren Dienern noch nicht klar gesagt? Zeigt ihnen ihren Platz, sonst widme ich meine Zeit und Energie jemandem, der sie zu schätzen weiß."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai examines you intently.{/n} "I have had enough of all this fussing. Why have you still not made it clear to your servants? Put them in their place, or I will save my time and energy for someone who appreciates them."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai mustert dich gründlich.{/n} "Ich habe genug von diesem Wirbel. Warum habt Ihr es Euren Dienern noch nicht klar gesagt? Zeigt ihnen ihren Platz, sonst widme ich meine Zeit und Energie jemandem, der sie zu schätzen weiß."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai seni dikkatle inceliyor.{/n} "Tüm bu yaygaradan bana gına geldi. Neden hizmetkârlarına bunu hâlâ açıklamadın? Onlara ağızlarının payını ver yoksa zamanımı ve enerjimi kıymetini bilecek birine ayırırım."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai examines you intently.{/n} "I have had enough of all this fussing. Why have you still not made it clear to your servants? Put them in their place, or I will save my time and energy for someone who appreciates them."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai, seni dikkatle inceliyor.{/n} "Tüm bu yaygaradan bana gına geldi. Neden hizmetkârlarına bunu hâlâ açıklamadın? Onlara ağızlarının payını ver yoksa zamanımı ve enerjimi kıymetini bilecek birine ayırırım."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion
